   24: -module(xmerl_sax_SUITE).
   25: -compile(export_all).
   26: 
   27: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: %% Include files
   29: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   32: 
   33: %%======================================================================
   34: %% External functions
   35: %%======================================================================
   36: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   37: %% Initializations
   38: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   39: 
   40: all() ->
   41:     [{group, bugs}].
   42: 
   43: groups() ->
   44:     [{bugs, [], [ticket_8213, ticket_8214, ticket_11551, 
   45:                  fragmented_xml_directive,
   46:                  old_dom_event_fun_endDocument_bug, 
   47:                  event_fun_endDocument_error_test,
   48:                  event_fun_startDocument_error_test,
   49:                  allow_entities_test, entity_recurse_limit_test,
   50:                  external_entities_test, fail_undeclared_ref_test
   51:                 ]}].
   52: 
   53: %%======================================================================
   54: %% Tests
   55: %%======================================================================
   56: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   57: %% Test Case 
   58: %% ID: ticket_8213
   59: %% Description: Checks that end of document is checked properly when continuation fun is missing.
   60: ticket_8213(_Config) -> 
   61:     {ok,ok,[]} = xmerl_sax_parser:stream("<elem/>", [{event_fun, fun (_E,_,_) -> ok end}]),
   62:     ok.
   63: 
   64: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   65: %% Test Case 
   66: %% ID: ticket_8214
   67: %% Description: Checks that attributes with default namespace don't get [] in NS field.
   68: ticket_8214(_Config) -> 
   69:     Event = fun ({startElement,"http://lshift.net/d","elem",
   70:                   {[],"elem"},
   71:                   [{[],[],"attr","123"},{"http://lshift.net/x","x","attr","234"}]},
   72:                  _, _) ->ok;
   73:                 ({startElement, _, "elem",_,_}, _,_) ->
   74:                     throw({test, "Error in startElement tuple"});
   75:                 (_E,_,_) -> ok
   76:             end,
   77: 
   78:     {ok,ok,[]} = xmerl_sax_parser:stream("<elem attr='123' x:attr='234' xmlns='http://lshift.net/d' "
   79:                                          "xmlns:x='http://lshift.net/x' />",
   80:                                          [{event_fun, Event}]),
   81:     ok.
   82: 
   83: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   84: %% Test Case 
   85: %% ID: ticket_8214
   86: %% Description: Checks that attributes with default namespace don't get [] in NS field.
   87: ticket_11551(_Config) ->
   88:     Stream1 = <<"<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\" ?>
   89: <a>hej</a>
   90: <?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\" ?>
   91: <a>hej</a>">>,
   92:     {ok, undefined, <<"\n<?xml",  _/binary>>} = xmerl_sax_parser:stream(Stream1, []),
   93:     Stream2= <<"<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\" ?>
   94: <a>hej</a>
   95: 
   96: 
   97: <?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\" ?>
   98: <a>hej</a>">>,
   99:     {ok, undefined, <<"\n\n\n<?xml",  _/binary>>} = xmerl_sax_parser:stream(Stream2, []),
  100:     Stream3= <<"<a>hej</a>
  101: 
  102: <?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\" ?>
  103: <a>hej</a>">>,
  104:     {ok, undefined, <<"\n\n<?xml",  _/binary>>} = xmerl_sax_parser:stream(Stream3, []),
  105:     ok.
  106: 
  107: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  108: %% Test Case 
  109: %% ID: fragmented_xml_directive
  110: %% Test of fragmented xml directive by reading one byte per continuation ca
  111: fragmented_xml_directive(Config) ->
  112:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  113:     Name = filename:join(DataDir, "test_data_1.xml"),
  114:     {ok, Fd} =  file:open(Name, [raw, read,binary]),
  115:     Cf = fun cf_fragmented_xml_directive/1,
  116:     {ok, undefined, _} = xmerl_sax_parser:stream(<<>>, 
  117:                                                  [{continuation_fun, Cf}, 
  118:                                                   {continuation_state, Fd}]),
  119:     ok.
  120: 
  121: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  122: %% Test Case 
  123: %% ID: old_dom_event_fun_endDocument_bug
  124: %%     The old_dom backend previous generateded an uncatched exception
  125: %%     instead of the correct fatal_error from the parser.
  126: old_dom_event_fun_endDocument_bug(_Config) ->
  127:     %% Stream contains bad characters, 
  128:     {fatal_error, _, _, _, _} = 
  129:         xmerl_sax_parser:stream([60,63,120,109,108,32,118,101,114,115,105,111,110,61,39,49,46,48,39,32,101,110,99,111,100,105,110,103,61,39,117,116,102,45,56,39,63,62,60,
  130:                                  99,111,109,109,97,110,100,62,60,104,101,97,100,101,114,62,60,116,114,97,110,115,97,99,116,105,111,110,73,100,62,49,60,47,116,114,97,110,
  131:                                  115,97,99,116,105,111,110,73,100,62,60,47,104,101,97,100,101,114,62,60,98,111,100,121,62,95,226,130,172,59,60,60,47,98,111,100,121,62,60,
  132:                                  47,99,111,109,109,97,110,100,62,60,47,120,49,95,49,62],
  133:                                 [{event_fun,fun xmerl_sax_old_dom:event/3},
  134:                                  {event_state,xmerl_sax_old_dom:initial_state()}]),
  135:     ok.
  136: 
  137: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  138: %% Test Case 
  139: %% ID: event_fun_endDocument_error_test
  140: event_fun_endDocument_error_test(_Config) ->
  141:     Stream = <<"<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?><a>hej</a>">>,
  142:     Ef = fun(endDocument, _ , _) ->  throw({event_error, "endDocument error"});
  143:             (_, _, S) -> S
  144:          end,
  145:     {event_error, _, _, _, _} = xmerl_sax_parser:stream(Stream, [{event_fun, Ef}]),
  146:     ok.
  147: 
  148: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  149: %% Test Case 
  150: %% ID: event_fun_startDocument_error_test
  151: event_fun_startDocument_error_test(_Config) ->
  152:     Stream = <<"<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?><a>hej</a>">>,
  153:     Ef = fun(startDocument, _ , _) ->  throw({event_error, "endDocument error"});
  154:             (_, _, S) -> S
  155:          end,
  156:     {event_error, _, _, _, _} = xmerl_sax_parser:stream(Stream, [{event_fun, Ef}]),
  157:     ok.
  158: 
  159: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  160: %% Test Case 
  161: %% ID: allow_entities_test
  162: allow_entities_test(Config) ->
  163:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  164:     File = filename:join(DataDir, "lol_1_test.xml"), %% Depth 9
  165:     %% Disallow entities
  166:     {fatal_error, _, _, _, _} = xmerl_sax_parser:file(File, [disallow_entities]),
  167:     ok.
  168: 
  169: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  170: %% Test Case 
  171: %% ID: entity_recurse_limit_test
  172: entity_recurse_limit_test(Config) ->
  173:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  174:     File1 = filename:join(DataDir, "lol_1_test.xml"), %% Depth 9
  175:     File2 = filename:join(DataDir, "lol_2_test.xml"), %% Depth 2
  176:     %% Default recurse limit is 3
  177:     {fatal_error, _, _, _, _} = xmerl_sax_parser:file(File1, []),
  178:     %% Change recurse limit
  179:     {ok, undefined, <<>>} = xmerl_sax_parser:file(File2, []),
  180:     {fatal_error, _, _, _, _} = xmerl_sax_parser:file(File2, [{entity_recurse_limit, 1}]),
  181:     ok.
  182: 
  183: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  184: %% Test Case 
  185: %% ID: external_entities_test
  186: external_entities_test(Config) ->
  187:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  188:     File1 = filename:join(DataDir, "entity_test_1.xml"),
  189:     File2 = filename:join(DataDir, "entity_test_2.xml"),
  190:     %% Allow all (default)
  191:     {ok, undefined, <<>>} = xmerl_sax_parser:file(File1, [{external_entities, all}]),
  192:     {ok, undefined, <<>>} = xmerl_sax_parser:file(File2, [{external_entities, all}]),
  193:     %% Allow file
  194:     {ok, undefined, <<>>} = xmerl_sax_parser:file(File1, [{external_entities, file}]),
  195:     {ok, undefined, <<>>} = xmerl_sax_parser:file(File2, [{external_entities, file}]),
  196:     %% Allow none (default)
  197:     {fatal_error, _, _, _, _} = xmerl_sax_parser:file(File1, []),
  198:     {error, _} = xmerl_sax_parser:file("NonExistingFileError.xml", []),
  199:     {ok, undefined, <<>>} = xmerl_sax_parser:file(File2, []), %% Not included but parsed, See if it can be fixed
  200:     ok.
  201: 
  202: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
  203: %% Test Case 
  204: %% ID: fail_undeclared_ref_test
  205: fail_undeclared_ref_test(Config) ->
  206:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  207:     File = filename:join(DataDir, "entity_test_1.xml"),
  208:     %% Allow none
  209:     %% fail_undeclared_ref == true (default)
  210:     {fatal_error, _, _, _, _} = xmerl_sax_parser:file(File, [{external_entities, none}]),
  211:     %% fail_undeclared_ref == false
  212:     {ok, undefined, <<>>} = xmerl_sax_parser:file(File, [{external_entities, none}, {fail_undeclared_ref, false}]),
  213:     ok.
  214: 
  215: %%======================================================================
  216: %% Internal functions
  217: %%======================================================================
  218: cf_fragmented_xml_directive(IoDevice) ->
  219:     case file:read(IoDevice, 1) of
  220: 	eof ->
  221: 	    {<<>>, IoDevice};
  222: 	{ok, FileBin} ->
  223: 	    {FileBin, IoDevice}
  224:     end.
